commands.clear_specific_queue.success.pr: Cleared queue with command prefix "%s" of %s messages.
commands.clear_specific_queue.success.ra: Cleared raw chat queue of %s messages.
commands.clear_specific_queue.fail.empty: Failed to clear queue with command prefix "%s" due to it being empty.
commands.get_specific_queue_contents.suc: Displaying the next %s messages from queue "%s".
Displaying the next %s messages from raw chat queue.
commands.get_specific_queue_contents.fai: Failed to get contents of queue with command prefix "%s" due to it being empty.
commands.clear_all_queues.success: Cleared all chat queues - %s total queues cleared.
commands.clear_all_queues.fail: Failed to clear all chat queues - all chat queues were empty.
